name: manGoweb opensource
tagline: Index of opensource projects from manGoweb.cz
body:
## Current projects

- [mango-cli](http://mangoweb.github.io/mango) - Scaffold and build your projects way more faster than before. Preconfigured frontend devstack to the absolute perfection. Fully automated to save your precious time. Ready for any type of web project.
- [mango-cli-example](https://github.com/manGoweb/mango-cli-example) - example project for mango-cli devstack

## Experimental projects

- [MangoPress](https://github.com/manGoweb/MangoPress) - Fine tuned WordPress structure with the horse power of the Nette Framework, all utilizing the Composer and mango-cli.


## Talks

- [CZ] [CodeCamp 2015 - JavaScript + DOM](https://github.com/manGoweb/codecamp-skoleni-js-dom) - a lecture about basis in programming for browsers


---

Check also our web [manGoweb.cz](http://mangoweb.cz)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
